insights.insight: Casual Bistro restaurants show 40% higher demand on weekends
insights.action: Increase weekend staffing by 27% for casual bistro locations

insights.action: Increase weekend staffing by 31% for seafood locations

insights.insight: Temperature above 32°C decreases casual bistro demand by 13%
insights.action: Implement weather-based staffing alerts for casual bistro locations

insights.insight: Temperature above 32°C decreases seafood demand by 15%
insights.action: Implement weather-based staffing alerts for seafood locations

insights.insight: Major local events increase overall demand by 7%
insights.action: Monitor local event calendars and pre-schedule +20% staff during major events

top_actionable_recommendations: Implement dynamic weekend staffing increases (20-40% based on restaurant type)
Deploy weather-based staffing alerts for temperature-sensitive locations
Create flexible on-call staffing model for high-volatility restaurants
Schedule optimized shift patterns: lunch (11:30-15:00), dinner (17:30-22:00)
Monitor local event calendars for demand spike preparation
